answers.answer: smaller girls tend to gain more weight when pregnant. if your doctor isnt concerned you should be. As long as your taking care of yourself and the baby everything is fine. Your body will gain what it needs. some people gain 10 some gain 30-40 depends on your body and baby

Oh hunny i feel u i feel so fat... i was always small before i got pregnant i was 125lbs and im now 39 weeks and gained about 19lbs and i swear the scales are wrong at my doctors bc i weigh at home to bottom line if u dont wanna gain too much weight follow the pregnancy weight gain guidelines and that will help u alot and besides alot of weight comes off after u have the baby....also what made me feel better i Googled what weight comes off after having a baby it breaks it down for u

Don't stress out about weight you will have plenty of opportunities to lose weight after baby comes. Stretch marks are inevitable. My body changed so drastically since I had my first baby. It's just part of motherhood and a long as you work on it after baby comes then you can get back down to a comfortable weight :) don't stress, enjoy your pregnancy
Also i prevented stretch marks by using palmers coco butter for scars and stretch marks works wonderful
